{"step_by_step_thinking": "Green discoloration of teeth is not a common symptom of any of the conditions listed. Tetracycline therapy can cause yellow or brown discoloration of teeth if given during tooth development. Fluorosis can cause white spots or streaks on the teeth, and in severe cases, brown stains. Erythroblastosis fetalis, a condition that affects newborns, does not typically cause tooth discoloration.", "answer_choice": "D. None of the above"}
